title: I have the same issue of other million of users of Pixel phone. No ringtone for calls or alarm.
content: It looks like we all are having the same problem. Now, I don't find an answer from Google, or how to contact them! I have the phone at 7000 miles from USA. So, I would like to talk to someone before to send the phone! But google is there only for business. Not to give service.
